com.ibm.mce.sdk.plugin.inbox

Class InboxMessageAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.mce.sdk.plugin.inbox.InboxMessageAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MceNotificationAction

    public class InboxMessageAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements MceNotificationAction
    This class is the notification action that opens an inbox message

      • handleAction

        public void handleAction(Context context,
                         java.lang.String type,
                         java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.String attribution,
                         java.lang.String mailingId,
                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> payload,
                         boolean fromNotification)
        This method handles the action call
        Specified by:
        handleAction in interface MceNotificationAction
        Parameters:
        context - The application context
        type - The notification action type
        name - The notification action name (can be null)
        attribution - The notification attribution (can be null)
        mailingId - The notification mailing id
        payload - The notification payload. The map contains the key value pairs from the notification action payload.
        fromNotification - true if this action is called from a notification and false otherwise

      • shouldDisplayNotification

        public boolean shouldDisplayNotification(Context context,
                                         NotificationDetails notificationDetails,
                                         Bundle sourceBundle)
        This method checks if inbox message is in the sdk db. If it's not, it returns false (which prevents the notification from appearing) and downloads the inbox message. After the message is downloaded, the notification will be displayed
        Specified by:
        shouldDisplayNotification in interface MceNotificationAction
        Parameters:
        context - The application's context
        notificationDetails - The received notification
        sourceBundle - The bundle that contained the notification
        Returns:
        true if inbox message is in the db and false otherwise
